column2: "Great work! Wherever naughty children fight against ARKS, Magical★Xiera is there to be their courage and their hope☆"
"Heheh, congratulations. Thank you for borrowing my strength this time, too. Everyone's smiles are safe and sound at last."
"Oh, by the way, about those exciting sweets we made... You haven't had your share, have you?"
"...Hey, wait a minute! Why are you trying to escape? You can't leave without taking your sweets..."
"She-she'll play a trick on you! Please, wait!"
